SELECT recruitmentName, detailLink, city, time FROM recruitment WHERE deleted = 0
AND recruitmentName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}), '%')
AND publishRange = #{range}
AND city LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{city}), '%')
AND TO_DAYS(time) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) <= DATE(time)
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(time)
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) <= DATE(time)
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= DATE(time)
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 60 DAY) <= DATE(time)
